General.Name: Chongqing Department Store Co Ltd
General.Description: Chongqing Department Store Co.,Ltd. operates department stores, supermarkets, and electrical appliances stores in the People's Republic of China. The company also trades in automobile. It operates various outlets in Chongqing, Sichuan, Guizhou, Hubei, and other places. The company was founded in 1950 and is based in Chongqing, the People's Republic of China.
